alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 15 at 1:20PM EDT until June 15 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Jefferson County in Big Bend Florida... Madison County in Big Bend Florida... Brooks County in south central Georgia... Southwestern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Thomas County in south central Georgia... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 120 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Monticello, Quitman, Madison, Thomasville, Valdosta, Lake Park, Boston, Pavo, Greenville, Morven, Barwick, Lee, Ashville, Grooverville, Dills, Lovett, Empress, Dixie, Pidcock and Everett. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
